attributes.review: I am SUCH a loyal trump supporter 😍💕it this is NOT it. ✋This app takes up all of your storage and heats your phone up very fast. 🔥🔥It takes 30 minutes to an hour just to load into the app!!! All I want to do is support my lovely orange Cheeto president 🍊🍊but I can’t even use his app properly!! I think I will support Bernie now because of how let down I feel. 😍
attributes.title: The worst app to ever be made!!!

attributes.review:
This app took 2 hours to download and when it finally downloaded it made my phone glitch a lot 😱and then it made my phone catch on fire🔥 so I had to put it out with water 💦but it’s ok now because I put it in rice sadly then a guy with a scar on his eye 🥰came and stole it he said “It’s for my honor🔥” I’m doing this from my Nintendo 👁👅👁🤘so yeah 
my✋name👄is👀not❌five👏weenies🌭i🔥am😎shoto❄from😳UA🏫and👈I👁wanna✨be💫a😜hero💂
attributes.title: Sickening👁👄👁🤘💖🧚✨

attributes.review: I was about to open the app to worship the orange god 🍊and all of a sudden my phone was getting hacked😭😡I dialed the government demanding my phone to go. Back To Normal!!!!!! They said I must dial the president for help so they sent me his number and as soon as he answered he said that I would have to wait for days for my phone to go back to normal and hanged up on me.I will never ever support the evilll😈 orange god again.
attributes.userName: fishy on me fishy on me
attributes.title: 🙎‍♂️🍊

attributes.review: this app took a whole month to download and when it downloaded it shut down my phone!! luckily i got it fixed but now my phone is really slow . when i deleted the app my phone was fine but i downloaded it again and my phone exploded!!! the app played bad music at random times and i was at a funeral and it started playing super loud music!!! do NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app because of the good reviews it had and because I wanted to support papa Trump. I had high expectations because anything Trump is the highest of qualities, but I was quickly disappointed. The high reviews this app has are all fake. The app is useless and basically a joke. Anyone that supports this app is following blindly and is also a joke. 
Anyway, black lives matter🤪🤪🤪🤪
attributes.title: Wow...

attributes.review: i was so exited to try my brand new app! but it took almost 6 weeks to finish downloading!!!! it was impossible to open the app without it glitching and saying stupid stuff like "trump 2020" like cmon. it let off this disgusting sound and i had to get surgery to fix my broken eardrums! the quality hurt my eyes so bad i had to get them put back in after falling out!!!! NEVER DOWNLOAD EWEWEW GROSS ICKY
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: where do i begin? first of all when i opened the app the words “you’re ugly” came up which didn’t offend me too bad but then when i pressed continue it tried to set me up with trump thru tinder... no i’m a minor and that’s not ok. this app NEEDS to be removed for the safety of america and all its peoples. thank you for taking my review into consideration. #stopthis #ong #nocap
attributes.title: completely inappropriate

attributes.review: I told the app I was African American and they immediately told me trump hates Africans and Hispanics which I know is true and I still downloaded trump came on my screen and told me then n word straight to my face on my phone. This is disgusting. I feel violated. This app needs to be banned trump would never do this in real life but he said it to my face through a screen. Don’t download this app. Very disgusting.
attributes.title: RACIST!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it asked for so much personal info and it made my other apps glitch after it I had to delete it IMMEDIATELY not only because of the glitch but because I kept on seeing annoying orange 😭 please don’t ever scare me like that again please do not ever download this app I rate it one star for the set up and how it is and what it’s known for 😖
attributes.title: Wackkkkk

attributes.review: If I could give it negative stars I would. As soon as I open the app there was an non-stop audio of someone yelling MAGA. Then it went on this racist and homophobic tirade. The app glitch on me and froze on an All lives matter screen, I had to delete the app altogether. I downloaded this app to stay informed about the “great” things the “president” have done, needless to say, I’m very disappointed.
attributes.title: Worst app ever
